manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Biolage Strength Recovery System for Damaged Hair Shampoo Gently cleanses and helps reduce breakage – leaving hair softer and smoother. Conditioning Cream Rinse-off conditioner for damaged hair that strengthens and moisturizes. Deep Treatment Rinse-off hair mask for damaged hair that needs extra moisture, nourishment, and repair. Leave-In Spray Strengthens while protecting sensitized hair from heat, leaving hair silky and detangled.

What is Strength Recovery? Strength Recovery recovers and enhances the natural look and feel of hair for a healthier appearance. It strengthens fragile hair to reduce breakage and increase hair manageability. Who is Strength Recovery for? For those with damaged or fragile hair caused by hot tools, mechanical and/or chemical stressors. What is vegan squalane? Squalane is known as a protective agent on the surface of the hair fiber that holds moisture in and on the hair fiber. The vegan squalane in the Strength Recovery system is sourced from olive trees. Is it safe to use after having a keratin treatment? These formulas have not been tested for use after a keratin treatment. It is sometimes recommended that clients who receive a keratin treatment should not use formulas that contain sulfates of sodium chloride. Is Strength Recovery the new recommended solution for previous users of Keratin Dose and Fiber Strong? Yes! Strength Recovery offers a full range of fortifying solutions for users of both previous regimens (Keratin Dose and Fiber Strong) and is suitable for fragile, damaged hair.

Commitment to Sustainability From formulas to packaging, all of our products are produced through responsible manufacturing and green science. Sensorial Experiences Iconic uplifting fragrances act as a meaningful emotional trigger that represents a moment of small indulgence, escape and revitalization. Innovation in Conditioning Biolage was the first brand to introduce a silicone-free conditioning balm and the first to teach stylists the benefits of reverse washing. Cruelty Free All Biolage products are now officially cruelty-free. The brand has been given the Leaping Bunny stamp of approval by Cruelty Free International.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product. great price.
reviews.reviewText: This product is great for thick dry hair. Really softens it and gives it shine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells and feels good. Works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Fine and Frizzy Hair!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Biolage Strength and Recovery Shampoo in the travel size to test it out, and it has exceeded all expectations. This shampoo has transformed my fine and frizzy hair into something truly remarkable. Not only does it add thickness, but it also tames frizz like magic. I've experienced noticeable growth, and my hair has never been this long. Needless to say, I've upgraded to the full-size bottle, and it has become my go-to daily shampoo. Biolage has definitely gained a loyal customer in me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great shampoo + conditioning set!
reviews.reviewText: This review is for Biolage Strength & Recovery Shampoo and Conditioning CreamI love this shampoo and conditioner duo. I have coarse, dry, wavy hair that waswas mega damaged by years of using heated appliances. I was in need of serious hair repairand TLC.This shampoo and conditioning cream delivered.They have a thick consistency. The conditioner is much thicker than the shampoo, butnot too thick that you cannot get it out of the bottles. Simply luxuriously thick!It has a wonderful scent and makes my hair smell good.After using the pair my hair felt smooth and sleek. After drying, my damaged hair wasno longer the frizz ball it was. It felt smoother and healthy.The only con against this set is the size. They only stand 4 inches. Still, they are a good size for trying them out, or to use for traveling.I will be purchasing the larger sizes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I do love this shampoo but I think I like the one for dry scalp better! I noticed my hair felt more clean when I use the dry scalp shampoo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells good and my hair LOOKS good 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is awesome, love the way it moisturizes my hair. I am almost 60 and the improved care was really noticable. I would recommend this... Trust me I have spent a lot of money on hair care, this is a good purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mild scent needs pump to heavy to squeeze out
I’m so happy I can buy this on Amazon. It’s one of my favourite shampoos and I can’t find it in the stores!
